extensionDescription.message: Allows to email link URL address from its context menu.
extensionDescription.description: Description of the extension displayed in the add-ons manager.

emailLinkContextMenu.description: Text for link context menu item. Should be the same as is Firefox https://transvision.mozfr.org/string/?entity=browser/chrome/browser/customizableui/customizableWidgets.properties:email-link-button.label&repo=gecko_strings

emailPageLinkContextMenu.description: Text for page context menu item. Should be the same as is Firefox https://transvision.mozfr.org/string/?entity=browser/chrome/browser/customizableui/customizableWidgets.properties:email-link-button.tooltiptext3&repo=gecko_strings

emailFrameLinkContextMenu.description: Text for frame context menu item.

emailImageLinkContextMenu.description: Text for image context menu item.

emailAudioLinkContextMenu.description: Text for audio context menu item.

emailVideoLinkContextMenu.description: Text for video context menu item.
